from(V).Description: A utility function to get the @B_android#support#design#widget#BottomSheetBehavior_E@ associated with the view.

Returns: The height of the collapsed bottom sheet in pixels, or @B_android#support#design#widget#BottomSheetBehavior#PEEK_HEIGHT_AUTO_E@ if the sheet is configured to peek automatically at 16:9 ratio keyline
getPeekHeight().Description: Gets the height of the bottom sheet when it is collapsed.

Parameters: int: The height of the collapsed bottom sheet in pixels, or @B_android#support#design#widget#BottomSheetBehavior#PEEK_HEIGHT_AUTO_E@ to configure the sheet to peek automatically at 16:9 ratio keyline.
setPeekHeight(int).Description: Sets the height of the bottom sheet when it is collapsed.

getState().Description: Gets the current state of the bottom sheet.

Parameters: boolean: true to make this bottom sheet hideable.
setHideable(boolean).Description: Sets whether this bottom sheet can hide when it is swiped down.

Returns: true if this bottom sheet can hide.
isHideable().Description: Gets whether this bottom sheet can hide when it is swiped down.

Returns: Whether the bottom sheet should skip the collapsed state.
getSkipCollapsed().Description: Sets whether this bottom sheet should skip the collapsed state when it is being hidden after it is expanded once.

setState(int).Description: Sets the state of the bottom sheet. The bottom sheet will transition to that state with animation.

Parameters: boolean: True if the bottom sheet should skip the collapsed state.
setSkipCollapsed(boolean).Description: Sets whether this bottom sheet should skip the collapsed state when it is being hidden after it is expanded once. Setting this to true has no effect unless the sheet is hideable.

ClassDesc: An interaction behavior plugin for a child view of @B_android#support#design#widget#CoordinatorLayout_E@ to make it work as a bottom sheet.
